articles.author: Kevin Hand
articles.title: Pakistan Cricket Board appoints Gillespie and Kirsten as men’s head coaches
articles.description: Kirsten to take charge in limited overs formats and Gillespie in Tests after months of turmoil in Pakistan cricket.
articles.content: Former South Africa batter and coach Gary Kirsten has been appointed head coach for Pakistan mens cricket team in limited overs cricket ahead of the upcoming ICC Mens T20 World Cup 2024 while former … [+2587 chars]

articles.title: Daughter’s moving tribute to beloved dad
articles.description: Phoebe Jones, the daughter of the late cricketing legend Dean Jones, has paid a special tribute to her father on her wedding day in the Philippines.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
